thread.title: Spurs waive SG Fredette

author: The Sports Xchange
title: Spurs waive SG Fredette
text:
Spurs waive SG Fredette The Sports Xchange 22 hrs ago The Sports Xchange Â© AP Photo/Rich Pedroncelli San Antonio Spurs guard Jimmer Fredette, right, drives against Sacramento Kings guard James Anderson during the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Sacramento, Calif., Thursday Oct. 8, 2015. Jimmer Fredette was waived by the San Antonio Spurs.
AdChoices Fredette, 26, was the 10th overall pick in 2011 with the Sacramento Kings and bounced from the Chicago Bulls to the New Orleans Pelicans before signing with San Antonio this summer.
He was the first player released from the Spurs' training camp roster. He made 2 of 10 shot attempts with the Spurs in three preseason games.
NBA rules require rosters be reduced to 15 by Monday.
